member.summary: Get all available rooms

member.remarks: This method returns all active rooms

member.summary: Get all available rooms of a given type
member.returns: Array of CalendarRoom objects or Nothing if no rooms where found
member.remarks: This method returns all active rooms of a given type

member.remarks: This method returns all active and inactive rooms

member.name: M:Hipergate.CalendarClient.GetRooms(System.String)
member.summary: Get all rooms of a given type
member.param: If it is an empty String then rooms of all types are returned.
member.returns: Array of CalendarRoom objects or Nothing if no rooms where found
member.remarks: This method returns all active and inactive rooms
